exit_tax.description: this is how much the owner takes as a cut when someone unbonds

min_withdrawal.description: This is the minimum amount we will pull out to reinvest, as well as a minumum that can be unbonded (to avoid needless staking tx)

owner.description: owner created the contract and takes a cut

validator.description: All tokens are bonded to this validator

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
